items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Action Adhesive Remover quickly breaks down adhesives for a no-fuss removal process.">
items.storedetaileddescription: Walker Tape®’s Action Adhesive Remover is our all-around, best-bet, skin safe adhesive solvent remover for removing adhesives. Action is designed to be fast-acting, working quickly to break down adhesives for no-fuss removal. And for clients with sensitive skin, Action Remover is made with skin-safe gentleness for an irritation-free experience.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable - do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Use in a well-ventilated area. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to cut, broken, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use.

 

Storage

 

Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). SDS sheet is available below.
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

  1. Spray Action Remover on the adhesive area. Remover will begin working almost immediately.
  2. Saturating the adhesive area and wiping off the residue once breakdown has occurred will help give the best results. The release time will depend on adhesive buildup.
  3. Wipe or brush off the residue from the system. Shampoo and rinse Action from unit.
 

For Solvent Soaks

  1. Fill a large bowl or sink with Action Solvent.
  2. Place the system into the solvent, base side up. Keep the system submerged and work the adhesive build up off.
  3. Wear gloves to keep your hands out of direct contact with the solution. Shampoo the system and rinse. Soak times vary from 5-30 minutes, depending on the type of system and adhesive used.
items.pagetitle: Action - 4 fl oz, Spray | Walker Tape
